attributes.action: Covid-19. Financial help for small business NOW. No small businesses=No economy.
attributes.additional_details:
Setup a fund, give them assistance now, this week.  Setup a lifeline for them now.  Setup a telephone line, email and social media access to make a claim for financial help.  Help is needed in Wales this week.
Thank you.
attributes.background: Small businesses in rural Wales are working exceedingly hard to carry on in normal circumstances.  The coronavirus is going to kill them if they do not get financial help now. They cannot otherwise survive, especially those depending on tourism and travel.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you want the Government or Parliament to do, and its possible the action you want would be a matter for the Welsh Government.

The Government has announced a number of measures to support businesses, including small and medium sized businesses, through the coronavirus outbreak: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/guidance-to-employers-and-businesses-about-covid-19/covid-19-support-for-businesses

The Welsh Government has also announced a package of support for small businesses to help them during the coronavirus outbreak: https://businesswales.gov.wales/coronavirus-advice
